Flask-dance Demo Registry¶

Contributing¶

Please create a branch and make a PR to add your project. Ideally, each project should contain a readme, source code and hosted demo.

Twitter¶

source:flask-dance-twitter-login-example
description:Um simples app para fazer login no Twitter

source:flask-dance-twitter-frontend
description:A VueJS frontend and Python backend
